body.name: Miabella Italian 925 Sterling Silver Byzantine Bracelet for Women, Handmade in Italy
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 3 hrs 32 mins
features: SIGNATURE ITALIAN BYZANTINE - Handmade by our finest artisans in Italy, this elegant and unique sterling silver Byzantine bracelet is perfect for everyday simple luxury. Polished links are beautifully woven by hand to create an Italian timeless classic that remains iconic to this day. Both delicate and bold, this bracelet makes a chic fashion statement and instantly elevates a casual look or dressy outfit. Wear layered with our matching Byzantine necklace for a cool touch of modern glam.

PURE 925 STERLING SILVER - Handcrafted of 925 sterling silver to give your jewelry a brilliant shine. Sterling silver is hypoallergenic and nickel-free making this jewelry a great choice for individuals with very sensitive skin. Unlike cheap metals, sterling silver does not irritate your skin and with proper care, will last a lifetime. Bracelet 1/4" wide (6.8mm). 4mm thick. Polished and domed on both sides. Strong and secure lobster clasp closure.

MADE IN ITALY - Italian jewelry is much more than a fashionable and elegant choice. Its rich history formed a people who strongly value creativity and passion. With a high demand for luxury Italian jewelry, early artisans paved the way for the superior design and quality craftsmanship still used today. High quality standards for fine jewelry in Italy are unmatched by any other country in the world making this a solid investment. Miabella jewelry is authenticated with a 925 ITALY trademark.

PERFECT GIFT FOR HER - Stylish bracelet with a sense of luxury for the modern woman who values beautiful Italian craftsmanship. Its unique personal design makes a chic statement and is the perfect gift for mom, daughter, wife, sister, aunt, niece, best friend, girlfriend, for you. Give her a versatile and gorgeous gift she is sure to love! VISIT OUR STORE: For a selection of 18K gold over silver and sterling silver bracelets, necklaces, rings, hoops, stud earrings and Lira coin jewelry.

GIFT BOX INCLUDED - Miabella jewelry is shipped in an elegant gift box, ready to treat yourself or a loved one for any anniversary, birthday, wedding, graduation, Christmas, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day and any other holiday or special occasion gifting. From cool modern to classic vintage, Miabella offers high quality affordable sterling silver jewelry for women and men, comfortable for everyday wear and for all occasions. 30-day money-back guarantee.
body.description: Miabella brings you the finest in modern and classic designs. This stylish Byzantine bracelet in 925 sterling silver is one of the most elaborate designs in jewelry with each link individually woven by hand. Crafted in Italy, this is sure to become a timeless staple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Well Made!
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for myself. It fits snug which I like best, so it does not dangle. The clasp is sturdy and the silver color is very bright. Price was reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful lightweight, box comes in long rectangle
reviews.reviewText: Gift for my mother, it’s beautiful, lightweight, seems very well crafted. Only issue is with the photos, it showed a square box so I planned my gift wrapping based on that, it actually comes in a long rectangular box. Not a huge deal just might want to update your photos

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bracelet is absolutely beautiful! The size is nice and beefy, and the quality is stunning, especially for this price! I will definitely be looking for more from this brand. EXTREMELY happy! You won’t be disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s well crafted. Smooth. Soft like but too big.I wish it was just a bit smaller. I bought it for my mother-In-law. She’s pretty petite and it almost falls off over her hand. I tried it on & it was quite big on me too.She’s 4’9” with wrist size where my thumb laps my middle finger a bit. I’m barely 5’3” and my thumb & middle finger touch. So not that much bigger but still. I gave it 4.5 just because it didn’t fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT piece of jewelry!
reviews.reviewText: It is surprisingly nice for the price, not chintzy. Very satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was really surprised when I opened the box! This bracelet is beautiful, shiny and lightweight. I will definitely buy from this seller again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was pleasantly surprised at how beautiful this bracelet was for the price. It looks very expensive and fit perfectly on my small wrist. Would definitely buy as a gift for a friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely gorgeous bracelet. It was a gift, it was so beautiful I didn’t want to give it away.
This was even better than expected. It’s a gorgeous piece of jewellery that I have wore every day since I’ve got it. Would recommend it’s Abbs absolutely unique and beautiful.
Muy bonita, no está tan pesada y se ve genial, excelente producto

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: That bracelet is lovely. It's 7mm and i have a little bit space but is really comfortable. I'm doing everything - cleaning, washing and it's still so shiny. Is really light and look good with all type of clothes. If you have any questions just txt me :)

reviews.reviewTitle: SO PRETTY ON MY WRIST. WELL MADE TOO!
reviews.reviewText: I was captivated by the beauty of this bracelet when looking to buy one online. The design is unique and just what I was looking for. It took a week to arrive and when I placed it on my wrist, I was delighted! I love it!❤️. Yes, it is real 925 sterling silver and it is a bit brighter in color. Looks fantastic on tanned skin. Have been wearing it for 2 weeks now and no tarnishing. It seems to be well made and I wear it daily. I highly recommend this beautiful bracelet! Now, I am going to purchase the matching necklace!

reviews.reviewTitle: Está hermosa. Super ligera y comoda.
reviews.reviewText: Está igual a la imagen, súper bonita, cómoda y los acabados muy limpios. Un broche muy seguro.
